ygData.subject: Some coments from necro site necromonitor about wizards !!
ygData.msgSnippet: Eheheheh look what a necromancers get from a petition ! Ehehehe yep wizard are great class we dont need petition, it was some comments on this list now looks
ygData.messageBody:
Eheheheh look what a necromancers get from a petition !

Ehehehe yep wizard are great class we dont need petition, it was some comments
on this list now looks what a necromancers have !! At 29 lv our spell do 250
dmg cc and it is as alwas many times resisted and it cost much mana! Necro have
at this lv a spell wich damage same amount 250, heal in same time, and cost
less mana, only it takes a longer time to deal it, but first they will not get
mob on them as a pet can deal similar damage and tount, they heal themselfs.


-Vampiric Curse / Bond of Death (formerly Circle of Death) (NECROMANCER) now
work with their new effects.

These are a new breed of DOT spells that not only damage but also restore HP
over time. Vampiric Curse is a Level 29 research only spell that seems to trade
about 250 damage for 250 HP over time. Note this spell will continue to heal
even after the target has died!



im pissed guys look a coments what a necro say about us !!

-Necromancer poison spells have had their damage doubled and their duration cut
in half. They will do EXACTLY the same amount of damage, but in half the
pervious amount of time.


A la petition.. we got what we wanted. Necromancers can now actually pace
wizards for damage in higher levels with effective stacking of DOTs. At L34
Necros have five stackable DOTs, at 39 they gain one more powerful one. And
damage for mana certainly outclasses wizards.

to see only one of nice necro spells i will also paste a comment on this one
spell


Allure of Death

This is an upgrade to the Dark Pact spell. It costs a meager 5 mana to cast and
is another one of our many Alteration magic based spells. This spell drains 8
life from you every round and exchanges it for 8 mana. As is tyical for
upgraded spells, this one lasts longer then the last version, Dark Pact. Now
what good does damaging oneself for mana have? A bit suicidal perhaps you
think? Well we Are Necromancers! As your health withers away and your mana
returns, start using your lifetap line of spells and heal up... With almost 100
specialization in Alteration Magic, I practically lifetap back as much health
as I lost to gain the mana, very useful. There are 2 particularly nasty
combinations with this spell beyond the lifetap casting. 1) Group with a Bard,
their heal song should offset your damage taken so that you in effect have a
super mana regeneration rate so long as bard plasy and you have allure up. 2)
Get Regeneration cast on you by a Shaman.... same effects as #1 above. The
downtime you may have had before is halved or less while using these
combinations. And to confirm this, Allure of Death does NOT turn you into
skeletal form, though once rumored to do so. A later upgrade called dead man
walking will do so.



Silverion Dragonirder

High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard
